title: otrkid1970
author: otrkid1970
content: I was using Bittrex and decided to jump over to Coinbase to give it a try.What a mistake. Coinbase is so shitty and generic compared to Bittrex. Coinbase you have ZERO options in regard to buying at a set price or putting in your sell price at higher than the current price.Bittrex for Example i can put in a BUY order for BTC when it hits $15K and just go about my business and once bought i can put that SELL order in for whatever price i want and walk away.Coinbase you have 2 shitty options buy or sell right now at the price right now.Why would anyone use this shitty generic welfare exchange? How is it still in business?

comments.author: LegendaryK
comments.body: Normal Coinbase is made to be easier for the average person as such advanced trading options are not available.You have to join their advanced trade , for the options most of us are used too, or just use another exchange that does not have the simpler trading option as their default.https://help.coinbase.com/en/coinbase/trading-and-funding/advanced-trade/dashboard-overviewQuoteAdvanced Trade gives you more robust tools to make better trading decisions. You have access to real-time market information through interactive charts, order books, and live trade history on the advanced trade view.https://www.gobankingrates.com/investing/crypto/coinbase-vs-coinbase-pro/QuotePro is designed for advanced users and active traders — and it’s less expensive.https://pro.coinbase.com/

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: It's been a while since I read that word "Bittrex", I'm surprised that anyone still uses Bittrex, I assume OP has used Bittrex this year. I don't use coinbase because it doesn't work in my country, but I think coinbase is better than Bittrex, and when you noticed this inconvenience in coinbase why didn't you create a binance account? because it seems to me that you want to be day trading so it makes more sense to use binance because of the high volume they have

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: It's because you're using the Coinbase as a wallet, they have an exchange just like what you want to exchange and set prices for buying and selling and that's the Coinbase Pro.(https://pro.coinbase.com/)

comments.author: stadus
comments.body: They are not a shitty exchange, you just don't get what you are looking for, so the right thing to do is to look for other exchanges that would satisfy your wants and needs. Coinbase is a legit exchange, they have plenty of users and they are regulated, so they are not shitty in general.
